option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
files are in the original binary format with internal compression.
files are in the revised binary format with a variable number of ranges.
files have a different stime size in header.
verbose. Log information to the console.
filename of the old binary snd format file to convert. If this is omitted, the file will be read from standard input

synopsis.p: Converts an old binary snd format file to the new dmap snd format.

description.p: Converts an old binary snd format file to the new dmap snd format.
The snd format data is written to standard output

example.description: Convert the binary file "1999041006gbr.snd" to produce the dmap snd format file "19990410.06.gbr.snd".
